value:
Whether as a knight or as a Hero, my
mission remains unchanged—fight on
behalf of all citizens. I'll do my best.

I was a castle knight back in Nohr.
But I was still green... Someday I'll be
a knight my friend can be proud of.

I hear you're from another world too.
Getting used to a new place isn't
easy, so let's help each other out.

How about we invite some other
Heroes to head into town together
sometime soon...$k$pI'd like to see someplace other than a
battlefield. Give it some thought, OK?

Oh, I was just checking up on my
horse's gear. Finding replacements
for my own gear is tough enough.$k$pI need everything I came here with to
last until I can return home.

Friends are the treasure of a lifetime,
so be sure to care for yours. Tidings
from $Nf.

I'm a step closer to being a great
knight!

I'm stronger today than I was
yesterday.

Hmm... Maybe I need to train
more?

Thanks to your help, I'm on my
way to becoming a proper knight.

My name is Silas, a knight of Nohr.
I'm a little surprised I was summoned,
but I'll do what I can to help!

Thanks for coming to chat with me.
It's a good distraction. I've grown
used to this world by now, but...$k$pThere are still a lot of Heroes around
here I don't know. I didn't realize how
tense that made me.$k$pAnd you wouldn't believe how stiff
that's made my shoulders!$k$pHuh? You want to give me a shoulder
rub? Heh, I must be a pretty big deal
to garner such attention from you!$k$pI'm kidding of course... But that does
feel better already. Speaking with you
is just as soothing, I might say.$k$pYou'll have to let me return the favor.
Do you have any problems you'd like
me to help you resolve?$k$pNo need to hold back. Ask me
anything. After all, our friendship
spans both space and time, right?
せいっ！
はあっ！
うわっ！
Not good...!
I'll make this quick.
I WILL protect my friends!
On my honor as a knight.
You're not getting past me!
I let you down...
Hey!
I became a knight hoping to one day reunite with my best friend.
If you ever need advice, come to me. I'll do what I can to help.
Uh... This is just how my hair grows. Please don't try to fix it.
Some people call me a do-gooder, but is that really a bad thing?
I'd hate to be your enemy. You could summon an entire army!
Askr has so much. I hope that, one day, Nohr will be like this.
On my honor as a knight, I promise to fight valiantly and protect this kingdom. I vow this to the Order of Heroes, and to you.
Yup!
One for all!
Together, now.
